backorder.item.message: This product will be removed from your cart. Please review our suggested alternatives.
backorder.item.message.noAlternate: This product will be removed from your cart. Unfortunately we have not been able to identify an alternative product.
backorder.item.message.requested.alterna: We have reduced the quantity of this product from {{ requestedQuantity }} to {{ backorderQuantity }}. Please review our suggested alternatives which may be available in higher quantities.
backorder.item.message.requested.noAlter: We have reduced the quantity of this product from {{ requestedQuantity }} to {{ backorderQuantity }}. Unfortunately we have not been able to identify an alternative product.
backorder.itemTotal: {{ orderEntries }} products in your cart are not available to back order and will be removed from your cart. Where possible we have changed the quantity of the product you requested and/or have identified alternative products you could purchase instead. Please review each item below before proceeding.
backorder.page.returnCart: Cancel and go back to Cart
backorder.page.title: We need to make changes to your order
backorder.page.stockEmail: Enter your email address below and we will notify you when the product(s) are back in stock.
backorder.page.emailDisclaimer: By submitting your email address, you consent to the use of the email address for the unique purpose of sending you an email to update you when the product is back in stock. We will not use your email address for anything else.
backorder.page.notifyMe.existingUserText: Thank you. We have already received your request and will update you soon.
